snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Monday's selection includes a technology magazine's hope for publication apps and subsequent disappointment, several views on the résumé of...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Monday's selection includes a technology magazine's hope for publication apps and subsequent disappointment, several views on the résumé of Yahoo's chief and a start-up firm creating software to help utilities store energy.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Grid Batteries and Buffett on Yahoo
